overview: When Bucky and Amanda suffer a "cooling off" of their relationship, they each decide to date another party, and see if it takes. The unusual thing is they do it on a game show called "Love 'Em or Leave 'Em", and they make their decision in front of millions of viewers. Will they stay or will they go, or will they just take their third parties and party till they're sore? The tale is on the tape.
title: Love 'em or Leave 'em
